metadata.title: CVE-2017-5611 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
SQL injection vulnerability in wp-includes/class-wp-query.php in WP_Queryin WordPress before 4.7.2 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary SQLcommands by leveraging the presence of an affected plugin or theme thatmishandles a crafted post type name.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-5611` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

wordpress - 4.7.2+dfsg-1
wordpress-l10n - 4.7.2+dfsg-1
wordpress-theme-twentynineteen - 4.7.2+dfsg-1
wordpress-theme-twentyseventeen - 4.7.2+dfsg-1
wordpress-theme-twentysixteen - 4.7.2+dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: wordpress package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.7.2+dfsg-1').
